page.title: 10MEDIA Newspaper 1
page.content: The Rickmansworth area's local newspaper is the "Watford Observer".It sees itself, according to Simon Berlin editor of the Three Rivers District, as a factual paper without political bias, reporting local news and current events in an impartial manner. The paper concentrates on human interest stories although it does cover politics, finance and sport aswell. With a circulation around 97,000 copies per week, it is a successful and widely read paper. Rickmansworth itself contributes less than 20% of the total news, consisting mainly of human interest stories; fetes, carnivals, charity sponsorships and so on.Rickmansworth is seen as a fairly affluent dormitory settlement. Most inhabitants are employed outside the town e.g. in London and Watford. Recent years have
